articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: "It's Going To Impact": Hardik Pandya On Missing This Star Player vs Australia - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Hardik Pandya will lead the Indian team in the first ODI against Australia as regular skipper Rohit Sharma will miss the contest due to family commitment.
articles.content: The recurrence of Shreyas Iyer's lower back injury will certainly impact India's World Cup preparations, feels stand-in ODI captain Hardik Pandya. Iyer has been ruled out of the Australia series due … [+1598 chars]
